name: BPOD_HEN_042
description:
beautiful piece of darkness #042 on HEN

this is not a product picture #010
this is a part of the Gesamtkunstwerk

In the background you can see the waste incineration plant of my hometown. As a child, the chimney was often a landmark for me.
We lived not far from the plant. When I looked out of the living room or bathroom window, I could always see it. 
If I saw the chimney from the back seat of the car while we were driving on the motorway, I knew we would soon be home. 
I never liked this chimney, but it is a part of my life. A part of my story. As a teenager I swore that one day I would replace the chimney with a mountain view.
20 years later, I still live in the same town and took this photo. This is not a product picture!

xmvfx

🖤✨
